entry.title: Using Bash, Unix Tools, and Hammerspoon to Speed Up Your Workflow
entry.summary: With just a basic working knowledge of writing Bash scripts and understanding Unix tools and their design philosophy, you can easily create scripts to automate your workflow and improve your productivity. In this post, we'll get our feet wet in writing Bash scripts and combine them with some powerful Unix tools to create a powerful and versatile toolset. We'll also explore how you can use Hammerspoon, a macOS automation tool, to take your automation to the next level.
